message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $14,000. I believe this is a fair offer considering the benefits it will bring to your business.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and the market rate.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price.  I'm willing to come down a bit, but $12,000 is below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about we meet at $12,500? I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I need to stay within my budget.
